1471340.name: Elliot Soundtrack
1471340.description:
Immerse into the amazing Elliot Original Soundtrack composed by Tiaviolí Gaming. Relax and enjoy +1 hour of happy and fun music composed of +20 themes.

Live music

Despite Plain and Game is an indie studio with few resources, we are proud to announce that some themes like "Yes My Lord" have recorded in live with musicians from the Balearic Symphony Orchestra.

Additional content

The soundtrack contains additional content such as cinematics and credits themes that will remind you Elliot, Manuel and the World of the Mombas.

Credits

Composer: Tiaviolí Gaming

Trumpet: Cyril Poulet
Trombone: Pere Garcies
Percussion: Juan Carlos Murgui
Violin: Enrique Pastor and Tiaviolí Gaming
